title: For all players
body: Maybe when you come to realize the universe doesn't revolve around you, we could have a less toxic and more enjoyable community. This can also help you in real life.

replies.body:
Motions can be perceived relatively, which when A rotates around B, it's pretty much the same as having B rotates around A, it's just from a different point of view.

So we revolve around the universe while being revolved around by it at the same time.

This is the Real real life message.

Muahahaha.
